channel.title: Purple Text, Snow, and Shop Problem
channel.description:
Ok...well, here's the first problem i got [b]1)[/b][i]When players talk, there is purple text over their head. How do I fix that? I'm guessing server.java somewhere[/i] [s][b]2)[/b][i]There's snow on everyones screen, how do I stop it for everyone?[/i][/s] [b]3)[/b][i]For shops, I got the shops.cfg for the shops. And autospawn for the NPC's. But yet it doesn't show the items in the interface[/i]
Anybody? :D

item.title: Purple Text, Snow, and Shop Problem
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

Tyvm, never changed anything in my weather.txt file so I don’t know how that happened lol.
Btw, it worked. ;)[br][size=1]Posted on: June 06, 2007, 08:09:07 PM[/size][hr]Someone else please help answer the other 2 questions

Read full topic

item.title: Purple Text, Snow, and Shop Problem
item.dc:creator: @bmxr4c3r709 bmxr4c3r709
item.description:
@bmxr4c3r709 wrote:

For the second one, Go to your weather.txt(might be in your data folder) and change it to 0.

item.title: Purple Text, Snow, and Shop Problem
item.dc:creator: @Rudolph Rudolph
item.description:
@Rudolph wrote:

Ok…well, here’s the first problem i got
1)When players talk, there is purple text over their head. How do I fix that? I’m guessing server.java somewhere
2)There’s snow on everyones screen, how do I stop it for everyone?
3)For shops, I got the shops.cfg for the shops. And autospawn for the NPC’s. But yet it doesn’t show the items in the interface

Anybody?
